entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Flurries at times heavy beginning late this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
